snippet: The judge hearing the case against Pfc. Bradley Manning at Fort Meade said she would decide Thursday on his lawyers’ request to dismiss seven of the charges.
abstract: Judge hearing case against Pfc Bradley Manning says she will consider request to dismiss seven court-martial charges, including allegations that he aided the enemy when he provided hundreds of thousands of classified documents to WikiLeaks.
lead_paragraph: The judge hearing the case against Pfc. Bradley Manning at Fort Meade said she would decide Thursday on his lawyers’ request to dismiss seven of the charges.

headline.main: Judge Considers Request to Dismiss 7 Charges Against Pfc. Bradley Manning
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Judge Considers Request To Dismiss 7 Court-Martial Charges
